dialogue: You need to clean the break room refrigerator more often.
We only do the highest priority tasks.
Mold started to grow in there.
Bacteria caused the mold to mutate.
It rapidly evolved into a sentient being fueled by forgotten lunches.
Then it learned language skills and got a job in human resources.
It plans to frame you for viewing inappropriate web- sites at work and then fire you.
This sort of thing usually works itself out.
